name: Poops
description:
You and your friend are both astronauts on a mission in space. As usual, you pull every day pranks on each other. Only this time, you poisoned your friend’s food with a laxative and unfortunately, he did the same. Now you’re both gonna have a shitty fight, in space. 

Online Game

-

Avgeris Fragos
Gerry Filipakos
